es.uam.eps.irg.rs.trec.eval.file.persistent
Class RecommenderResultInMemory


java.lang.Object

  es.uam.eps.irg.rs.trec.eval.file.persistent.RecommenderResultInMemory
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistentRecommender, java.io.Serializable
public class RecommenderResultInMemory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, PersistentRecommender

This class reads from file previously estimated preferences, in order to use it as a dummy recommender. It keeps all the information in memory.
